value:
Aren't kimonos lovely? Getting this
one made was a bit difficult, but one
day even that will be a great memory.

A world in which people, regardless
of who they are, can celebrate the
new year together...$k$pIf our rulers can build such a world,
I have no doubt its future will be
bright beyond compare.

If you revel too much, a foe might see
it as an opportunity to strike. So take
care to never drop your guard.

Is Captain Ranulf here? Oh, Lyre
asked the same thing? Really now...
That girl's getting ahead of herself.

Hmph... Hyah! No matter the season,
a true warrior of Gallia neither forgets
nor neglects their training.

Happy New Year. You are friends
with $Nf, right?$k$pI was asked to bring you this. Here,
greetings for the new year.

Heheh... It looks like this year is going
to be a very good one indeed.

I haven't neglected my training, so my
fangs are as sharp as ever. This battle
is only just getting started.

This is a trivial setback. I assure you
it will not hinder the performance of
my troop.
If you wish it...I will obey.

Happy New Year. Let's greet this
year as allies.

Oh, $Nu!$k$pAhem... Excuse me, Summoner.
Going to the shrine together the
other day was fun, wasn't it?$k$pI wished for the safety and peace of
this land, as well as the prosperity of
my people in Gallia.$k$pHm? Did you expect me to wish for
something involving Captain Ranulf?$k$pOh, Summoner... The two of us
already share an unbreakable bond
forged on countless battlefields.$k$pIt is the duty and pride of a warrior
of Gallia to use their power to its
utmost when the need arises.$k$pRest assured, I shall show you all that
I am capable of here, on this stage
and beneath these clear blue skies.$k$pI pray that we will be able to spend
this year and the many years that lie
beyond it at each others' sides.$k$pRight now, in this moment...that is
what I wish for. What is your wish?
はあっ
くらいなさい
ぐあっ…
なんと…
New beginnings!
Happy New Year!
May you have an excellent start!
New year, same battle.
Was I not festive enough...?
Ha...
Happy New Year. May we both succeed in all our endeavors.
Hm? Were you trying to push me? I almost thought a bug landed on my shoulder.
Aren't kimonos lovely? I feel even more graceful than usual in this!
It's cute that you think you have a chance, Lyre... But I'm not letting you have Captain Ranulf this year either!
Do you know where Captain Ranulf is? I need to make sure he sees my new look!
The start of a new year is a time of celebration. We all feel that, no matter who we are.
May we always be together this year as well.
Of course.
Hmm... Where to go...
No time like the present.
